name: Noam Rosenthal
bio: Noam Rosenthal is an independent web platform consultant, specializing in contributing to browser engines, web performance and graphics. Noam is a WebKit reviewer, a Chromium contributor, co-author of the paint timing API, and an invited expert to the W3C web performance working group. Noam had accumulated over 20 years of experience building websites, apps, platforms and browsers, at Nokia, Samsung, Wix.com and other companies.
